trends: There have been no other sightings in Washington
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was sitting on my deck in my backyard with my cat on my lap. it was late, and very dark. there wasn't any noise. i was just admiring the clear sky. suddenly, my cat began to get very tense. his claws tightened and his ears went back on his head. he turned to look over my shoulder, so i turned as well. i gasped as i saw a ufo maybe 100ft away, hovering at maybe the height a helicopter would. it wasn't making any noise at all and just hovered. it was a disc shape, very flat, and very illuminated. i stood and walked to the closest edge of my deck, and in a blip, it was gone. i was shocked and a little scared, and my cat was still in a panic.
Summary: low flying ufo seen in my backyard, not a sound, dissapeared quickly
